items.question: What is EventDesk and how can it help my event planning business?
items.answer: EventDesk is a comprehensive event planning platform designed specifically for non-technical event planners, freelancers, and corporate managers. It streamlines your entire event planning process from initial client contact to final invoice, featuring mobile-first guest management, budget tracking, timeline management, and automated workflows. Unlike complex software that requires technical expertise, EventDesk is intuitive and guides you through every step.

items.question: How does the mobile guest management system work?
items.answer: Our mobile-first guest management system allows your guests to RSVP, update their information, and manage their attendance directly from their smartphones. You can send invitations via SMS or email, track responses in real-time, manage dietary restrictions and special requests, and even handle last-minute changes. The system automatically syncs with your event dashboard, giving you complete visibility into attendance numbers and guest preferences.

items.question: Can EventDesk help me stay within budget and track expenses?
items.answer: Absolutely! EventDesk includes comprehensive budget management tools that track expenses in real-time, categorize costs by vendor or service type, generate expense reports, and alert you when approaching budget limits. You can create detailed estimates for clients, convert them to invoices with approval workflows, and track payments. The system also provides insights into your most profitable event types and helps identify cost-saving opportunities.

items.question: I'm not very tech-savvy. How difficult is EventDesk to learn?
items.answer: EventDesk is specifically designed for non-technical users. The interface is intuitive with guided workflows that walk you through each process step-by-step. We provide comprehensive onboarding, video tutorials, and dedicated support to ensure you're comfortable using the platform. Most users are planning their first event within 30 minutes of signing up. Our goal is to simplify, not complicate, your event planning process.

items.question: What types of events can I manage with EventDesk?
items.answer: EventDesk is versatile and supports all types of events including corporate meetings and conferences, weddings and social celebrations, trade shows and exhibitions, fundraising events and galas, workshops and seminars, product launches, and networking events. The platform adapts to your specific event type with customizable templates and workflows tailored to different event categories.

items.question: How much does EventDesk cost and what's included?
items.answer: We're currently in beta and offering early access to help shape the platform. Pricing will be announced closer to our official launch, but we're committed to keeping it affordable for freelancers and small businesses while providing enterprise-grade features. Early access members will receive special pricing and grandfathered rates. All plans will include core features like guest management, budget tracking, and basic reporting.

items.question: How secure is my client and event data?
items.answer: Data security is our top priority. We use enterprise-grade encryption for all data transmission and storage, regular security audits and compliance checks, secure cloud infrastructure with automatic backups, role-based access controls, and GDPR compliance for international clients. Your client information and event details are protected with the same level of security used by major financial institutions.

items.question: Can my team collaborate on events within EventDesk?
items.answer: Yes! EventDesk supports team collaboration with role-based permissions, shared event dashboards, task assignment and tracking, real-time updates and notifications, and communication tools integrated into each event. You can invite team members, assign specific responsibilities, and ensure everyone stays informed about event progress and changes.

items.question: How does EventDesk help with client communication and approvals?
items.answer: EventDesk streamlines client communication through automated email updates and notifications, client portals where they can view event progress, digital approval workflows for contracts and changes, integrated messaging within the platform, and professional proposal and invoice generation. Clients can approve estimates, make payments, and stay updated on their event progress without constant back-and-forth emails.

items.question: How do I get started with EventDesk?
items.answer: Getting started is simple! Join our early access program by filling out the form on this page. We'll send you an exclusive invite for EventDesk. Early access members will be among the first to use the platform and will receive special onboarding support to ensure a smooth transition to EventDesk.
